title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2341/78 of 6 October 1978 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1271/78 concerning measures to improve the quality of milk within the Community
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2341/78  of 6 October 1978  amending Regulation (EEC) No 1271/78 concerning measures to improve the quality of milk within the Community
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1271/78 is hereby amended as follows:    1. Article 1 (2) is replaced by:
"2. Application of the measures referred to in paragraph 1 shall not extend beyond 31 March 1980."
2. The following is added to Article 3 (1):
"However, in cases where adequate reasons are given, a proposal may be submitted within the period referred to in the previous subparagraph, with a statement that it will be completed before 1 April 1979 in order to comply with the conditions laid down in Article 4. If this time limit is not observed the proposal shall be considered void."
3. The second subparagraph of Article 4 (2) is deleted.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 6 October 1978.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
